channel.description: Why is writing on Twitter worth it? If you write a post that resonates with people. it can go viral because of the Twitter flywheel. A blog has no loop or algorithm to help you gain traction 4 Elements to a Twitter thread: Lead-in Tweet (Hook the reader, What do they get by reading the rest of the thread?) Headline and first sentence combined Who is it for? What is it about? Why should they trust you? What will the reader “get” in exchange? How is their life going to be different after they read? The 6 proven first-sentence formulas: • A moment in time • A controversial opinion • A vulnerable statement • A weight, unique insight • A strong declarative sentence • A thought-provoking question So avoid things like: • “Most” • “I think” • “Maybe” Main Points TL;DR Recap CTA (Collect their email, send them to your site, show them more of your content, etc.
